mapper.select: SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname , IF(tlkm.likeNo,1,0) AS isLiked FROM tbBoardMaster tbmt INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo LEFT JOIN tbLIkeMaster tlkm ON tlkm.targetNo = tbmt.boardNo AND tlkm.likeTypeCd = '003001' AND tlkm.regUser = #{loginMemNo} WHERE tbmt.viewType = '01' AND tbmt.boardTypeCd = #{boardTypeCd} ORDER BY tbmt.regDt DESC

SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname FROM tbBoardMaster tbmt INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo WHERE tbmt.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND tbmt.viewType = '01'

SELECT tbmt.boardNo , tbmt.boardTypeCd , tbmt.title , tbmt.contents , tbmt.viewType , tbmt.regUser , tbmt.regDt , tbmt.updUser , tbmt.updDt , tbdc.useReply , tbdc.useNickname FROM tbRecommendMaster trcm INNER JOIN tbBoardMaster tbmt ON trcm.targetNo = tbmt.boardNo AND tbmt.boardTypeCd = '002001' AND tbmt.viewType = '01' INNER JOIN tbBoardUgc tbdc ON tbdc.boardNo = tbmt.boardNo WHERE trcm.viewType = '01' AND trcm.targetTypeCd ='002001' ORDER BY
RAND(),
trcm.sortNo ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbBoardMaster ( boardTypeCd, title, contents, viewType, viewCnt, regUser, regDt ) VALUES ( #{boardTypeCd}, #{title}, #{contents}, '01', 0, #{loginMemNo}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO tbBoardUgc ( boardNo, ugcTypeCd, useReply, useNickname ) VALUES( #{boardNo}, #{ugcTypeCd}, #{useReply}, #{useNickname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbBoardMaster SET likeCnt=likeCnt + 1 WHERE boardNo=#{targetNo}
UPDATE tbBoardMaster SET likeCnt=likeCnt - 1 WHERE boardNo=#{targetNo}
